body_html:
The official switch to bazel is now planned for 1.11 release.
Windows CPU build is now enabled and enforced for master, and it should now just work
We are working on the documentation, and will make sure to push the documents before 1.11 release.

body:
The official switch to bazel is now planned for 1.11 release.
Windows CPU build is now enabled and enforced for master, and it should now just work
We are working on the documentation, and will make sure to push the documents before 1.11 release.
